original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2696)@  在武將四周，召喚出8隻<color=#4cc769>白毦兵</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>白毦兵</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1226)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1226)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2696)@ Around the generals, 8 <color=#4cc769>white soldiers</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>White 毦兵</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color>$Soldier_HP(1226)@ Force value:  $Soldier_Str(1226)@
